message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a great deal considering its value to you is $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $12000.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $17000. This is my final counteroffer, and I think it's a fair compromise considering its value to me is $18000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16500 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering its value to me is $12000.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $17000, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free warranty and maintenance package, which would normally cost $1500. This way, you'll get the product and some added value for the same price as my previous offer. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $17000
